name: Square² Demo
description:
You play as a square that is trapped inside of an area, there are bombs that spawn which bounce from wall to wall and torpedos that will chase after you relentlessly. Your objective is to collect buffs to help you get the highest score possible.

GAMEMODES

Single player - Play on your own trying to beat your high score and prove your the best.

Duel - Play against a friend on the same device, collect coins to fill up your bars - first to succeed wins the round.

INCLUDED IN THE DEMO

  • 2 Game Modes
  • 7 Map Layouts
  • 8 Player Skins
  • 2 Enemy Types (3 if you include other players)
  • Various Player Buffs
  • A Good Time *hopefully
  • Keyboard and Gamepad Support

WHAT TO EXPECT IN THE FULL GAME

  • More Game Modes
  • Online Multiplayer *eventually
  • Lots More Map Layouts
  • More Hidden Secrets
  • Plenty More Player Skins
  • New Enemies
  • And Much More...

The game will be available on various platforms, this page will get updated when a new platform is ready. Platforms to come - Android, IOS

Android will be available very soon.

If you have any feedback let me know, it's not likely that the demo version will get updated but all suggestions etc... will be considered for the full release.
